ISSUE.TITLE: Registration activation with "+" in the email addres will not be successfull
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Steps to reproduce the problem: If the activation link contains the email in an unescaped format like this (user+name@gmail.com) then the plus sign in the URL is represents a space, so the activation will not be successful for the email "user name@gmail.com". Source: Premium Support #14907
